title: Design-Based Learning and Mentoring Program for Developing Remote Education Instructors’ Professional Expertise

context.prior_knowledge: Over one year of online teaching experience
context.additional_context: Targeting teachers/pre-service teachers in language education, focusing on student-centered lesson design and technology integration competency enhancement

learning_goals: Participants can apply student-centered lesson design principles in remote education environments with over 80% accuracy.
Participants can develop interaction strategies using digital tools to improve online class participation rates by over 30%.
Participants can practically implement at least two lesson design improvements through a mentoring process with peer instructors.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
